metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for interoperability between coding agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI

plugins.name: interdoc
plugins.description: Recursive AGENTS.md generator with structural auto-fix, CLAUDE.md harmonization, incremental updates, diff previews, and smart monorepo scoping. Cross-AI compatible.

plugins.name: tldr-swinton
plugins.description: Token-efficient code reconnaissance for LLMs. Autonomous skills save 48-85% tokens via diff-context, semantic search, structural patterns, and symbol analysis. Includes MCP server for direct tool integration.

plugins.name: tuivision
plugins.description: TUI automation and visual testing - Playwright for terminal applications. Spawn, interact with, and screenshot TUI apps via MCP.

plugins.name: tool-time
plugins.description: Tool usage analytics for Claude Code and Codex CLI. Tracks tool patterns via hooks, detects inefficiencies, and offers opt-in community comparison with anonymized data.

plugins.name: clavain
plugins.description: General-purpose engineering discipline plugin. 5 agents, 37 commands, 27 skills, 1 MCP servers — combining workflow discipline with specialized execution agents. Includes Codex dispatch, cross-AI review (interpeer with quick/deep/council/mine modes), and structured debate. Companions: interphase, interline, interflux, interpath, interwatch, interlock.

plugins.name: interpub
plugins.description: Safe plugin publishing — bumps all version locations, validates sync, commits and pushes with confirmation.

plugins.name: interfluence
plugins.description: Analyze your writing style and adapt Claude's output to sound like you. Ingest writing samples, build a voice profile, and apply it to any human-facing documentation or copy.

plugins.name: interline
plugins.description: Dynamic statusline for Claude Code — shows active beads with priority and title, workflow phase, coordination status, and Codex dispatch state. Integrates with Clavain, interphase, interlock, and beads.

plugins.name: interphase
plugins.description: Phase tracking, gate validation, and work discovery for the Beads issue tracker. Companion plugin for Clavain — adds lifecycle state management on top of the core beads plugin.

plugins.name: interflux
plugins.description: Multi-agent document review engine — scored triage, domain detection, content slicing, and knowledge injection. 7 review agents, 2 commands, 1 skill, 1 MCP server. Companion plugin for Clavain.

plugins.name: interpath
plugins.description: Product artifact generator — roadmaps, PRDs, vision docs, changelogs, and status reports from beads state, brainstorms, and project context. Companion plugin for Clavain.

plugins.name: interwatch
plugins.description: Doc freshness monitoring — drift detection, confidence scoring, and auto-refresh orchestration across product artifacts and code docs. Companion plugin for Clavain.

plugins.name: interlock
plugins.description: Multi-agent file coordination — reserve files before editing, detect conflicts, exchange messages between agents. MCP server wrapping intermute with hooks, commands, skills, and git pre-commit enforcement. Companion plugin for Clavain.

plugins.name: interslack
plugins.description: Slack integration for Claude Code — send messages, read channels, test integrations.

plugins.name: interform
plugins.description: Design patterns and visual quality for Claude Code — distinctive, production-grade interfaces.

plugins.name: intercraft
plugins.description: Agent-native architecture patterns — design, review, and audit for agent-first applications.

plugins.name: interdev
plugins.description: Developer tooling for Claude Code — MCP CLI interaction and tool discovery.

plugins.name: internext
plugins.description: Work prioritization and next-task analysis — tradeoff-aware recommendations from beads state and project context.

plugins.name: interject
plugins.description: Ambient discovery and research engine — scans arXiv, HN, GitHub, Anthropic docs, Exa for new capabilities. MCP server with embedding-based recommendation engine, confidence-tiered output pipeline, and learned interest profiles.

plugins.name: interkasten
plugins.description: Bidirectional Notion sync for Claude Code. Three-way merge conflict resolution, beads issue tracking, and 21 MCP tools for project lifecycle and sync control.

plugins.name: intercheck
plugins.description: Code quality guards and session health monitoring — context pressure tracking with time-decay, syntax validation for 8 languages, and auto-formatting via ruff/shfmt/gofmt/jq/prettier.

plugins.name: interstat
plugins.description: Token efficiency benchmarking for agent workflows — PostToolUse:Task hook captures real-time events to SQLite, SessionEnd hook backfills token data from JSONL, report shows percentiles and decision gate.

plugins.name: interserve
plugins.description: Codex spark classifier and context compression — MCP server exposing classify_sections, extract_sections, and codex_query tools for token-efficient document review.

plugins.name: interlens
plugins.description: 288 FLUX cognitive lenses for structured thinking — MCP server with lens search, thinking mode workflows, belief statement generation, quality evaluation, and solution synthesis.

plugins.name: intermux
plugins.description: Agent activity visibility — tmux monitoring, activity feeds, health detection. Enriches intermute with live context. 7 MCP tools for cross-agent observability.

plugins.name: intersearch
plugins.description: Shared embedding and search infrastructure — sentence-transformer embeddings and Exa web search, used by interject and interflux.

plugins.name: intermap
plugins.description: Project-level code mapping MCP server: project registry, call graphs, impact analysis, agent overlay. Go + Python bridge.
